mapper.sql: SELECT INQUIRY_NO inquiryNo, INQUIRY_TITLE inquiryTitle, INQUIRY_CONTENT inquiryContent, M.NICKNAME nickName, COUNT, TO_CHAR(I.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as createDate FROM TB_INQUIRY I JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_NO = I.INQUIRY_WRITER) WHERE I.STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_INQUIRY WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT INQUIRY_NO inquiryNo, INQUIRY_TITLE inquiryTitle, M.NICKNAME nickName, COUNT, TO_CHAR(I.CREATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as createDate FROM TB_INQUIRY I JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_NO = I.INQUIRY_WRITER) WHERE I.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY INQUIRY_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_INQUIRY SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND INQUIRY_NO = #{inquiryNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_INQUIRY ( INQUIRY_NO, INQUIRY_WRITER, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_CONTENT, COUNT ) VALUES ( SEQ_INO.NEXTVAL, #{inquiryWriter}, #{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiryContent}, #{count} )
mapper.delete: UPDATE TB_INQUIRY SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND INQUIRY_NO = #{inquiryNo}
